title: The Championship Skin for this year
body: I know Championship Riven is not coming back for now( {{item:3070}} {{champion:92}} {{item:3070}}) but any word if we getting one this year thresh and shyvana are coming back, so will we get one new this year

replies.body:
Hey travesuras,

Championship Shyvana and Championship Thresh are legacy, which means there's a good chance they'll be making an appearance in the store again. 

As for the 2015 Championship skin - **Championship Kalista** is heading to the PBE right now!

>As for the 2015 Championship skin - Championship Kalista is heading to the PBE right now!

Oh thank Raptor Jesus she's not the Victorious receiver.  I don't want that thing anywhere near my owned list and was willing to submit a ticket if that was going to be the case.

The boards will cry out their pains.

but now with CHAMPIONSHIP EFFECTS

btw. I forget. What decided on who got a Victorious/Championship skin?? I think one was based on who was most played for the season or something.
We take a lot into consideration for the Victorious and Championship skins. The TL;DR is we're looking for impactful champions during the current season.

AZIR PLZ, i want a skin for him so badly but im waiting for one instead of getting galatic. hell it'd be awesome if he even got a legendary skin, you kinda get your hopes up when it takes a while for a skin to come out that it will be pretty decent.

So we're going to finally see the Victorious Urgot??? All hail the Crab King!!!

... But my honest guess is Sivir. Been bum-rushing folks all season long. Which, being a Sivir main, would make me very VERY happy. :)

I understand that's a major point, but it seems incredibly unfair for those "forgotten" champions that never see competitive play and don't see balance changes like Malzahar (Not that I'm specifically endorsing a Malzahar skin).

/Edit No don't mention that X champion saw play once somewhere, because that's clearly not the same thing as it's not impactful during the season.
